question.title: What is the term for the early stage of puberty characterized by the appearance of pubic hair and the growth of the testicles in boys?
question.description: A) Adrenarche, B) Pubarche, C) Thelarche, D) Gonadarche

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: The early stage of puberty characterized by the appearance of pubic hair and the growth of the testicles in boys.

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: The stage of puberty where the breasts begin to develop in girls.

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: The stage of puberty where the genitals become more adult-like in appearance.

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: The stage of puberty where the body starts to produce hormones that cause the growth of the bones and muscles.
